hero.title: UK Used Truck Imports to Cyprus
hero.subtitle: Based in Limassol, Cyprus, we specialize in importing quality used commercial vehicles from the UK market.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.description1: Operating from Cyprus, we import used trucks and commercial vehicles from the UK market, offering Cypriot businesses access to well-maintained European brands at competitive prices.
whatWeDo.description2: Our inventory includes trucks from leading manufacturers such as Mercedes-Benz, Scania, Volvo, DAF, MAN, and Iveco. All vehicles are EURO 6 certified and suitable for Cyprus registration. Browse our current selection to find vehicles suitable for your business operations.

quality.title: Quality Standards
quality.description: UK commercial vehicles are known for high maintenance standards and comprehensive service histories.

rightHand.title: Right-Hand Drive Options
rightHand.description: Access to right-hand drive vehicles for markets where this configuration is preferred.

pricing.title: Competitive Pricing
pricing.description: The UK market offers good value for quality used trucks suitable for various applications.
